member.summary: Publish all customization. Not necessary after a import of an managed solution
member.param: Environment the action should be performed against.
Log Level - Error, Warning, Info, Verbose or Debug
DataVerse Service Client timeout represented as a TimeSpan. - defaults to: 15 minutes
member.remarks: Due to Microsoft's PublishAll API Message often timing out first time after a Solution Import (although publish went through server-side), this function will retry once after timeout failure.

member.name: T:DG.Daxif.Setup.CredentialManagement
member.summary: Contains the credential management logic of Daxif. The first time you use a certain credential key, it prompts the user for input, and validates it. If valid, the login information is encrypted and stored locally in a "<key>.daxif" file in the Daxif folder. Next time that credential key is used, it will load the login information from that file instead of prompting the user.
